creditline: Gift of David L. and Mary M.D. Parker
signed: verso in pencil: David L. Parker, printed 2002, Delhi, India - (cross out) 1993 / Leoprosy Mission - Patient after eye surgery | verso in pencil: David Parker 6/27/2002
text: Hospitals such as the one managed by Leprosy Mission have been working with patients for decades, providing much needed treatment. David L. Parker’s interest in child labor was what first drew him to photographing patients of Hansen’s Disease, and his medical training provided the tools to understand the need to destigmatize the disease. Carefully posed, the patient appears as an individual, and not merely a medical statistic.
title: Portrait of Post-Eye Surgery Patient, Leoprosy Mission, Delhi, India
